title: No Fee!! Large Brighton 1Bd, Laundry, HW Flooring, Cat Ok, Avail 10-1!
posting_body: Save $1,925 off your move-in balance right off the bat!!!
-640 Sqft 1Bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment located on Commonwealth Avenue, in Brighton.
Flooring in living room, hallway and bedroom.
-Multiple closets allow for an abundance of storage space.
-Tiled kitchen comes with oven/stove, full refrigerator and plenty of cabinet space.
-Heat and Hot Water included in rent
-Coin-Op laundry available in basement of building
-Call about this listing, don't wait until it's too late!!
-Apartment comes available on 10-1 for a 12 month lease only!!
All apartments advertised by Prestige Rental Solutions are available on an equal opportunity basis.
